item.description:

item.title: T900 Ultra 2 Max Smart Watch
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description: ✅ 1-3 days battery ( Varies with use). ✅ Display:2.3 inch HD IPS. ✅ Screen Resolution:320x280. ✅ Operation System: ANDROID, IOS. ✅ Waterproof : IP67(only daily using, no swimming/bathing/diving and so on). ✅ Water Resistance Depth:3BAR. ✅ Screen Material: IPS. ✅ Case Material: ALLOY. ✅ Material: Stainless steel. ✅ Charging mode: Magnetic wireless charging. ✅ App : hiwatch plus. ✅ Bluetooth call ,Auto Date, Complete Calendar, Multiple Time Zone, Water Resistant, chronograph, Solar, Moon Phase, Alarm, COMPASS, Luminous, DIVER, Repeater, Shock Resistant, Voice recorder, photography, Sleep Tracker, Fitness Tracker, Back Light, Stop Watch, Slide rule, Answer Call, Mood Tracker, Dial Call...etc.
item.content:encoded:
A smartwatch is a wearable computer in the form of a watch; modern smartwatches provide a local touchscreen interface for daily use, while an associated smartphone app provides for management and telemetry.
Feature : Wireless charging capability, Always display, Shows notification of Calls / Email / SMS / WhatsApp / WeChat & etc.

item.title: T500 Ultra Smartwatch
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description: ✅ Strap Material: Silicone. ✅ Main Screen: 1.99 inches LCD 250 x 285. ✅ Bluetooth-compatible: Bluetooth-compatible 5.0 supports Bluetooth-compatible calls. ✅ Charging mode: Magnetic Charging. ✅ Touch Screen: Full touch screen. ✅ Appearance Material: Zinc alloy. ✅ Waterproof: IP67 (the watch cannot be placed in water). ✅ Size: 38.5 x 44.5 x 14mm.

item.title: PQ3 Bone Conduction Wireless Earphones
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
PQ3 Bone Conduction Wireless Bluetooth Earphones MINI TWS Ear Clip

✅ Bluetooth version: V5.3 ✅ Talk time: about 6 hours ✅ Music playing: about 6 hours ✅ Standby time: 80 hours ✅ Communication distance:>10M ✅ Charging time of headset: about 1 hour ✅ Headphone battery capacity: 30mAH ✅ Battery capacity of charging chamber: 300mAH ✅ Frequency characteristic: 2.40GHz - 2.48GHz ✅ Support protocol: A2DP1.3/HFP1.6/HSP1.2AVRCP1.6/D11.3
item.content:encoded:
Multiple use key

Pause/Play: Click MFB
Previous song: double-click the MFB key on the L side
Next song: double-click the MFB key on the R side
Volume increase: three clicks on the L side
Volume key: three clicks on the R side
Answer the call: Double-click MFB
Hang up the phone: double click the MFB key
Incoming call rejection: long press MFB key for 2 seconds
Cancel call: double click MFB key
Call Siri: click the left or right MFB key three times when the song is not playing
Cancel Siri: Double click the left or right MFB key

item.title: BOYA M1 Microphone
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
BOYA M1 Microphone For Smartphone, DSLR, Laptop & PC

✅ First Copy [not original brand] ✅ Brand: Boya ✅ Model Number: Boya BY-M1 ✅ Transducer: Electret Condenser ✅ Polar pattern: Omnidirectional ✅ Frequency Range: 65Hz ~ 18 KHz ✅ Signal/Noise: 74dB SPL ✅ Sensitivity: -30dB +/- 3dB / 0dB=1V/Pa, 1 kHz ✅ Output Impedance: 1000 Ohm or less ✅ Connector: 3.5mm (1/8”) 4-pole gold plug ✅ Battery Type: LR44 ✅ Dimensions: Microphone: 18.00mmH x 8.30mmW x 8.30mmD ✅ Cable: 6.0m
